    • Uses of FlexOrder in energy.usef.agr.service.business

      Methods in energy.usef.agr.service.business with parameters of type FlexOrder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AgrValidationBusinessService.validateCorrespondingFlexOffer(FlexOrder order)
      This method first fetches a list of PtuFlexOffers based on the given FlexOrder's sequence and domain, then attempts to match the PTUs based on price and power.
      void AgrValidationBusinessService.validateFlexOrderTiming(FlexOrder order)
      FlexOrders should only be accepted if they refer to a future period or contain future PTU's with a power value != 0.
